item.description: My primary goal as an educator is to provide a holistic, inclusive, and student-centered education that fosters critical thinking and empowers students to address complex and real-world challenges. In pursuit of this goal, I leverage my unique background in building physics, urban climatology, and computer science to design curricula that prepare students for the evolving demands of architecture and engineering professions. My commitment to fostering critical thinking and creativity was forged during my first substantial teaching experience at the National University of Singapore (NUS).
